input.sentences: the family took a vacation by the ocean .
they came to some old buildings by the water .
the baby was curious about what was around him .
then they all sat down to eat .
after that they went on a boat out in the ocean .
output.sentences: This summer, my family went on vacation to the ocean.
We could see the water from all the buildings!
Our baby was curious about all his surroundings.
We made sure to take a break and sat to eat.
We even got to go out on the ocean in a boat!
